p: Between July 2012 and June 2017, 97 464 hospitalizations with an influenza diagnosis have been recorded in metropolitan France, of which 91 255 (94%) occurred during the five influenza seasons. The rate of influenza hospitalizations varied between seasons from 13/100 000 in 2013‐2014 to 46/100 000 in 2016‐2017 (Table 1, Figure 1).
